page.title: 17LIFE STYLES.
page.content: Roos Arms has 7 rooms downstairs and 8 rooms upstairas.It used to be called Roos Arms Inn.Now it is called Roos Arms Resturant.Today you can get bar meals and at night an "a la carte" menu.Bar opening times are 11am.-3pm. and 7-11pm. six days a week and Sunday 12-2.30pm.The resturant is open six days a week. A long time ago Black Horse Inn was a policeman's cottage.The Black Horse sells bar meals and in the morning it opens at 11am. and closes at 3pm.Regular Country and Western nights take place there also. Sand le Mere caravan park has a pub called the Mermaid which includes a bar and resturant which is closed in the winter months.Entertainment is provided here throughout the summer season including discoes,cabaret,bingo and country and western nights.
